description: Try our easy to follow Avocado Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salsa,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Avocado Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and deseed 3 avocados. Dice flesh and place in a bowl. Add juice of 2 limes, 2 tbs extra virgin olive oil, 1 small red onion and chopped coriander. Add a few drops of hot sauce and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve salsa with crab legs or fish bites.
